name: Pokeball
title: Pokeballs
info: A basic pokeball for capturing Pokemon.

name: Adept Pokeball
title: Pokeballs
info: A pokeball with modifications suited for experienced trainers, made to make capturing mid-sized Pokemon easier.

name: Advanced Pokeball
title: Pokeballs
info: A stronger version of the pokeball for catching dangerous Pokemon. Has a high chance to capture.

name: Master Pokeball
title: Pokeballs
info: The most powerful pokeball, almost guaranteed to catch any Pokemon. Very expensive, indeed.

name: Medkit
title: Healing Items
info: A basic medkit to heal minor injuries on a Pokemon in combat.

name: Adept Medkit
title: Healing Items
info: A larger medkit to bring an injured Pokemon to a much better condition.

name: Advanced Medkit
title: Healing Items
info: A medkit used by professionals to bring Pokemon out of critical injuries.

name: Master Medkit
title: Healing Items
info: A medkit with the most advanced restorative options. Can bring a Pokemon from the brink of death back to full health.

name: Berry
title: Booster Items
info: A fruit which boosts Attack power temporarily. +20% ATK for 4 rounds.

name: Super Berry
title: Booster Items
info: A sweet fruit which greatly boosts Attack power temporarily. +50% ATK for 3 rounds.

name: Golden Berry
title: Booster Items
info: A potent fruit packed with nutrients that doubles Attack power for a short time. +100% ATK for 2 rounds.

name: Citrus
title: Booster Items
info: A citrus fruit which balances a Pokemon's chi, giving them greater defense. +30% DEF for 4 rounds.

name: Super Citrus
title: Booster Items
info: A more concentrated citrus fruit that nourishes lost vitamins, boosting defense even more. +60% DEF for 3 rounds.

name: Golden Citrus
title: Booster Items
info: An exotic citrus fruit that instantly replenishes lost nutrients and doubles defensive capabilities. +100% DEF for 2 rounds.

name: Rare Candy
title: Instant Items
info: A sugary delight that instantly increases your Pokemon's level by 1.
